commands.name: az network watcher troubleshooting show
commands.summary: Get the results of the last troubleshooting operation.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher troubleshooting show --resource
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--resource-type {vnetGateway, vpnConnection}]
                                        [--watcher-rg]
examples: az network watcher troubleshooting show -g MyResourceGroup --resource MyVnetGateway --resource-type vnetGateway

commands.name: az network watcher troubleshooting start
commands.summary: Troubleshoot issues with VPN connections or gateway connectivity.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher troubleshooting start --resource
                                         --storage-account
                                         --storage-path
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--resource-type {vnetGateway, vpnConnection}]
                                         [--watcher-rg]
examples: az network watcher troubleshooting start -g MyResourceGroup --resource MyVPNConnection --resource-type vpnConnection --storage-account MyStorageAccount --storage-path https://{storageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net/{containerName}
